page.title: 05SOCIAL SURVEY.
page.content: A survey of 96 children has revealed that this is a largely middle class, commuter area,with pleasant environ- ment,convenient to the motorway and with a wide choice of housing being the major reason for living here.The majority of fathers commute to Runcorn,Ellesmere Port and Widnes travelling by private car.The main occupations being managerial (19%) education(9%),chemists(16%) and engineering(31%),others(25%).69% of wives have jobs.52% of the families live in detached property,35% live in semi-detached and 12% in cottages or terraced.Other statistics revealed that 27% of families holiday abroad,57% stay in the U.K.and 15% alternate each year.Leisure activities include golf,music,bowls, squash,sailing,yoga,badminton, walking and gardening.
